title: My music
subtitle1: Through a combination of experimental approaches and deep club-rooted sound, I seek balance — in the unity of complexity and simplicity, I create technologically advanced and complex, yet accessible worlds that are easy to feel.
subtitle2: My music is played in DJ sets and listened to worldwide, supported by top artists (Sorrow, KOAN Sound, Куок, Kursa) and covered by diverse media outlets (Rendah Mag, FUXWITHIT, аппрув, WARHOL)
